name: garbage game
description:
By: @AshleyPringle
  • left mouse button to grab
  • release to throw
  • shake bag for more garbages
  • throw garbages in can
  • this game saves your score periodically. ctrl + e at title screen to erase score.

almost all sounds made by me, except:

  • garbage can + buzzer from freesounds.org
  • tin can, glass break + ghost garbage from solliss GDC bundle
  • raccoon from http://www.fcps.edu/islandcreekes/ecology/raccoon....
